item.title: 上周五，Nvidia 公司的市值首次突破 2 万亿美元，对其芯片的巨大需求使该公司成为人工智能热潮的先驱。更多信息
item.description:
Nvidia hit $2 trillion in market value for the first time on Friday, riding an insatiable demand for its chips that made the company the pioneer of the generative AI boom. Read more https://t.co/XE4l1wTKww pic.twitter.com/QTTQqJLOvu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 看Reddit 表示，其净亏损已缩小至 9080 万美元，2023 年的营收增长率约为 21%，这家社交媒体公司正在为 3 月份在美国股市的首次亮相做准备。
item.description:
WATCH: Reddit said that its net loss narrowed to $90.8 million and revenue growth was roughly 21% in 2023, as the social media company prepares for its debut in the US stock market in March https://t.co/a7wmB2dbeK pic.twitter.com/ZdHu5yyLi6

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: AT&T 在美国的服务在近 10 个小时后恢复。在中断高峰期，报告的中断次数超过 70,000 次。更多信息
item.description:
AT&T services in the US were restored after nearly 10 hours. At peak disruption, more than 70,000 outages were reported. Read more: https://t.co/0iMTmg2Grj pic.twitter.com/PamdsWI4We

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 观看：人工智能的热潮帮助英伟达周四获得了 2,770 亿美元的股票市值，这是华尔街历史上最大的单日涨幅，超过了 Meta Platforms 在 2 月 2 日创下的 1,960 亿美元的单日涨幅纪录。
item.description:
WATCH: The buzz around artificial intelligence helped Nvidia gain $277 billion in stock market value on Thursday, Wall Street's largest one-day gain in history, beating the previous record set by Meta Platforms, which saw a $196 billion gain on February 2 https://t.co/iHG4fnBaBV pic.twitter.com/lrYvj4sTrA

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：科技巨头英伟达（Nvidia）的估值在第四季度井喷后接近 2 万亿美元。@rob_cyran 解释了人工智能军备竞赛如何在几年后使该公司的价值大幅提升。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Tech giant Nvidia’s valuation is approaching $2 trillion after a blowout fourth quarter. @rob_cyran explains how an AI arms race might make the company worth substantially more in a few years' time pic.twitter.com/XU0hiWp8jg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024
